heading: HR00416
0: RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE IMMEDIATE RESIGNATION OF OFFICIALS IMPLICATED IN THE PRACTICE OF "DRUG RECYCLING," INCLUDING THE PLANTING OF EVIDENCE AND RESELLING OF DRUGS SEIZED AS EVIDENCE, BY OFFICERS OF THE PHILIPPINE DRUG ENFORCEMENT AGENCY AND THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE, ALONG WITH PNP CHIEF POLICE GENERAL OSCAR ALBAYALDE, TO PAVE THE WAY FOR A CREDIBLE INVESTIGATION INTO THE SAME, AND URGING THE PERTINENT OFFICES INCLUDING THE OMBUDSMAN TO FILE THE APPROPRIATE CHARGES AGAINST ALL THOSE FOUND TO BE INVOLVED
principal-authors: CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; GAITE, FERDINAND R.; CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on DANGEROUS DRUGS since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00416
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE IMMEDIATE RESIGNATION OF OFFICIALS IMPLICATED IN THE PRACTICE OF "DRUG RECYCLING," INCLUDING THE PLANTING OF EVIDENCE AND RESELLING OF DRUGS SEIZED AS EVIDENCE, BY OFFICERS OF THE PHILIPPINE DRUG ENFORCEMENT AGENCY AND THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE, ALONG WITH PNP CHIEF POLICE GENERAL OSCAR ALBAYALDE, TO PAVE THE WAY FOR A CREDIBLE INVESTIGATION INTO THE SAME, AND URGING THE PERTINENT OFFICES INCLUDING THE OMBUDSMAN TO FILE THE APPROPRIATE CHARGES AGAINST ALL THOSE FOUND TO BE INVOLVED
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTRO, FRANCE L., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., GAITE, FERDINAND R., CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C., BROSAS, ARLENE D., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
DATE FILED : 2019-10-03
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DANGEROUS DRUGS ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-11-04;
